steps.title: Check Bike Sensor Cable
steps.description: Make sure your bike sensor cable is connected to the Peloton Tablet.

steps.title: Firmware Reset
steps.description: Go to Settings, system menu and perform a Firmware Reset.

steps.title: Initial Setup
steps.description: Wait for the Peloton to reboot, finish the initial setup and select "Skip Home Installation"

steps.title: Access Developer Options
steps.description: Go to Settings -> Device Preferences, then tap 7 times on Build Number to enable Developer Options

steps.title: Enable USB Debugging
steps.description: Go back to Settings -> Developer Options, then Enable USB debugging

steps.title: Force Quit Device Management
steps.description: Go into your system, Apps, select system in the top right corner. Force quit the App with the Peloton logo named "Device Management"

steps.title: Connect USB Cable
steps.description: Plug your computer into the Peloton using a micro USB-B cable.

steps.title: Allow USB Debugging
steps.description: Select "always allow this computer" and allow USB debugging.
